verbs.description: [V: According] to the news over the weekend , it looks as if Donald Trump and his legal team sent a twenty page confidential memo to Special Counsel Robert Mueller
[ARGM-ADV: According to the news over the weekend] , [ARG0: it] [V: looks] [ARG1: as if Donald Trump and his legal team sent a twenty page confidential memo to Special Counsel Robert Mueller]
According to the news over the weekend , it looks as if [ARG0: Donald Trump and his legal team] [V: sent] [ARG1: a twenty page confidential memo] [ARG2: to Special Counsel Robert Mueller]
